resources.string:
"Who Knows?" quiz game is designed for users to play without getting bored. There are a few important points:

In the game, you have 3 different lifelines that you can use at any time:
 * Phone a Friend Lifeline
 * 50:50 Lifeline
 * Ask the Audience Lifeline

The prizes you can win if you know the answers to the questions are as follows:
 12th Question -> 1,000,000 TL
 11th Question -> 250,000 TL
 10th Question -> 125,000 TL
 9th Question -> 60,000 TL
 8th Question -> 30,000 TL
 7th Question -> 15,000 TL
 6th Question -> 7,500 TL
 5th Question -> 5,000 TL
 4th Question -> 3,000 TL
 3rd Question -> 2,000 TL
 2nd Question -> 1,000 TL
 1st Question -> 500 TL

As the prize values increase in the game, the questions also become more challenging.

Application developed by:
 -> Mübeşşir Yusuf AKHAN
 -> İpek DEMİRYÜREK
 -> Muammer ACAR
 -> Alper Efe YETER

You can send your feedback and suggestions to byappsdvlp@gmail.com or k0d3in@dnmx.org. Have fun...
